Cecilware ESP1 220V Venezia II One Group Espresso $ 2,809.00 S&H: see site GO TO SHOP at The WEBstaurant Store help The Cecilware ESP1-220V 1 group espresso machine features touchpad operation and quick recovery to dispense preset portions of espresso quickly and easily! This single head espresso maker features a dual pressure gauge for monitoring water pressure and boiler steam pressure, and a heavy duty design for durability. Two and one cup filter holder assemblies and hoses are also included. The Cecilware ESP1-220V 1 Group espresso machine requires a 240V electrical connection and must be hard wired; a line cord is included without a plug. ETL and NSF Listed. Please consult the Specification Sheet for additional details and installation requirements. Requires a water hookup. Overall dimensions are 21 1/4"W x 21 1/2"D x 20 1/4"H. An inline water filter must be installed for the warranty to be in effect. See Companion Items for a suitable water filter kit. Also known as ESP1220V and ESP1 220V. ESP1-220V From Grindmaster Cecilware heart Cecilware ESP1 220V Venezia II Espresso Machine $ 4,235.40 S&H: see site GO TO SHOP at Restaurant Equipment World help Venezia II Espresso Machine, automatic, 1 group, 6 quart s/s boiler, 240 cups per hour, touch pad controls&LED display, auto cleaning function, hot water dispensing valve, 240v, 2.5kw, 10 amps, ETL, NSF (Cecilware) heart Cecilware ESP1 220V Venezia II Espresso Machine A $ 2,743.88 S&H: see site GO TO SHOP at KaTom Restaurant Supply help Venezia II Espresso Machine, automatic, 1 group, 6 quart s/s boiler, 240 cups per hour, touch pad controls&LED display, auto cleaning function, hot water dispensing valve, 240v, 2.5kw, 10 amps, ETL, NSF (Cecilware) ( Cecilware - ESP1-220V ) heart Grindmaster Cecilware Venezia II Espresso Machine $ 2,809.00 S&H: see site GO TO SHOP at ARCO Coffee Co. help AttributesAutomatic # Of Heads: 1 Group Boiler Size: 6 qts. Features Fully Automatic - Dispense single or double espresso, 1 or 2 cups at a time, or choose continuous flow. Dual Pressure Gauge - readouts for the dispensing water pressure&boiler steam pressure. User Friendly - Microprocessor technology, featuring touch pad controls&LED display. Heavy Duty Design - Built-in 260W motor&200-300 qt/hr pump. Sight Glass - For instant&easy monitoring of the water tank level. Auto Cleaning Function - Flushes the line to the brew head. Stainless Steel Dual Boiler. NEMA 120V plug 5-15P, Depth: 17.5 in Height: 12.75 in Width 7.5". heart Commercial Countertop Electric Deep Fryer Cecilwar $ 246.75 S&H: $ 0.00 GO TO SHOP at eBay help Model: EL6 Cecilwares medium duty, portable fryers have a contemporary, new design. Their precision rounded corners and sleek stainless steel construction complement any kitchen. The fryers offer complete flexibility to quickly cook up a host of appetizer and dinner specials. They are perfect as your primary or secondary fryer to help out during busy times. Product Features All Stainless steel construction Thermal overload device shuts off the heating element if it gets too hot Safety cutoff heart Cecilware Al Len Coffee Ground Dispenser 11 1 4inx $ 405.74 S&H: $ 28.40 GO TO SHOP at Instawares, LLC help Al-Len Coffee Ground Dispenser - 18-1/2"H 1-1/2 to 3-1/4 ounces portion control For drip or coarse ground coffee Dispenses into brew basket up to 8-3/4"in diameter Lexan hopper Stainless steel construction heart Cecilware Model A Al Len Ground Coffee Dispenser $ 204.99 S&H: see site GO TO SHOP at The WEBstaurant Store help Quickly grind coffee for fast and easy distribution with the Cecilware Model A Al-Len ground coffee dispenser! The Model A can be modified to dispense coarse-ground coffee in 1.5 to 3.25 oz. portions with the turn of a knob, and it accommodates brewing baskets up to 8 3/4"in diameter. A brew funnel prevents accidental messes and product loss, and the durable Lexan hopper can hold up to 6 lbs. of coffee at a time. Quality designed, engineered, and constructed stainless steel. Ideal for large events. Brews consistently perfect coffee batch after batch. This is a PRE- OWNED machine. It has been cleaned, serviced, and inspected by qualified technicians and is in excellent working condition.Comes with a 30 day warranty. Item Description: FE-200 only - Two Brew Buttons - For high and low volume periods, this feature allows you to brew either 1 or 2 lbs. of coffee at a time by the push of the 1 or 2 lb. brew button. - Durable Stainless Steel Finish - Tomlinson Faucets - Standard. Plumbing: 1/4"Water line required. Great for kitchens where space is at a premium, this 75,000 BTU unit lets you easily delight customers with delicious foods thanks to the 36"x 15 1/2"cast iron cooking grate and reusable lava rock briquettes that create authentic charbroiled taste and appearance. Each of the unit's six burners are independently controlled for maximum convenience, and boast higher levels of power to give you optimum production capabilities while maintaining a small footprint! This unit features heavy-gauge steel unibody construction, a stainless steel front, 2 1/2"adjustable legs, and a removable, non-corrosive aluminum drip pan for convenience and durability. The Cecilware CCB1836 has a 3/4"NPT gas manifold pipe and is NSF Listed. Please consult the Specification Sheet for additional details. Choose fuel type.
